events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th at the intersection of Main and 5th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial incident report and vehicle details.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further documentation about the car accident.
The client was informed that their vehicle accident claim has been received and is now under review.
Request sent to the claimant asking for photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and medical receipts related to the accident.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including collision photos, police report, and repair estimates from the garage.
The claim investigation was initiated to verify damage, liability, and coverage details related to the auto collision.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault and the vehicle damage is consistent with the reported accident.
The insurer proposed a full settlement covering repairs for the vehicle damages as per the policy limits.
Claimant expressed satisfaction with the communication process and the fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim has been approved formally to proceed with payment and vehicle repair.
Payment has been issued to the claimant's designated repair shop to cover the vehicle damages under the claim.
The claim was closed after successful payment issuance and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
